item.title: GWCP Production AMER/CAN Tenant (v.1.76)
item.content:encoded:
[Medium] - General Platform Maintenance

Summary: Guidewire will be conducting general platform and tenant maintenance to production environments, which may cause brief service interruptions with certain applications. If any availability issues last beyond the maintenance window, customers are advised to log an incident using Guidewire Community.

THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT May 26, 06:00 - 12:00 UTC

Feb 15, 21:26 UTC
Scheduled - Guidewire will be conducting general platform and tenant maintenance to production environments during this time. While not expected, customers may experience brief service interruptions with InsuranceSuite, xEngage applications, and/or CDA/Explore/DHIC within the specified maintenance window. Tools such as Guidewire Cloud Console (GCC) and Guidewire Cloud Home (GCH), source code management, and build management remain unaffected by this maintenance.

If customers experience any availability issues lasting beyond the maintenance window, please log an incident using Guidewire Community.
